Texts.Eng: I see you got your Bahamut license. ^green;we can upgrade your ship now. If you bring me ^orange;32 upgrade modules ^green;I'll initiate the upgrade.
I see you got your Condor license! ^green;Now we can upgrade your ship. If you bring me ^orange;10 upgrade modules ^green;I'll initiate the upgrade procedure.

The upgrade is complete! You've finally reached the limit of this ship's ability to self-upgrade. If there's any way to make a ship finer than this, the knowledge is hidden out there among the stars...
heheheh. ^green;You've got more problems than just trading for illegal goods it seems...
